pages.title: Redstone Flux (FE)
pages.text: Redstone Flux (RF) is essentially the energy that flows through redstone.$(br2)RF acts as a highly simplified form of energy that is designed to be easy to use. A few mods in this modpack takes advantage of Redstone Flux energy

pages.title: Conversion
pages.text: Redstone Flux for some mods require conversion if you want to use Forge Energy or anything equivalent. you can use $(l:modwikis/21_energyconverters)Energy Converters$(/l)
